title: Nehelana ka Tempele ea Orbital
heading: Qetella Monehelo oa Hao
chooseHow: Khetha mokhoa oo u ka ratang ho tlatsa monehelo oa hau o huloang lekhetho:

option1.heading: Khetho ea 1: Nehelana ka Marang-rang Hona Joale
option1.description: Tlatsa monehelo oa hau hang-hang u sebelisa karete ea mokoloto, karete ea banka, kapa mekhoa e meng ea ho lefa ea inthaneteng ka mofani oa rona ea sireletsehileng oa lichelete, The Field . U tla fumana rasiti ea lekhetho hanghang.

option2.heading: Khetho ea 2: depositi ea Banka ho The Roy Foundation
option2.description: Etsa depositi e tobileng ea banka kapa u fetisetse ka mohala ho The Roy Foundation , molekane oa rona oa leano le motšehetsi oa lichelete. Khetho ena e loketse menehelo e kholoanyane kapa phetisetso ea machabeng.
option2.instructions: Ka kopo, kenyelletsa " Orbital Temple - {donationType} " sebakeng sa litšupiso. Kamora ho phethela phetisetso ea hau, re romelle lengolo-tsoibila ho sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art ka lintlha tsa hau tsa phetisetso hore u fumane rasiti ea hau ea lekhetho.
option2.button: Ikopanye le Rona Mabapi le depositi →

taxInfo.heading: Ho Fana ka Lekhetho
taxInfo.description: Orbital Temple ke projeke e tšehelitsoeng ka lichelete ea The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , mokhatlo oa 501(c)(3) o sa etse phaello. Menehelo eohle ea US e khafisoa ka mokhoa o lumelletsoeng ke molao.
